Detailed Drawings
description: Variation of Condition 1 of planning permission dated 22nd June 2021 (RN: 21/00511/FULL) for, 'Erection of rear extensions at second, third and fourth floor levels to incorporate a new lift; demolition of existing mansard roof and erection of replacement mansard; demolition and replacement of rear courtyard floor slab; installation of air conditioning units at roof level and under pavement basement vaults; demolition and rebuild of two chimney stacks on the mews; replacement of windows on all elevations of the main house, demolition and re-building of rear ground floor toilet annexe, and associated internal and external works'; NAMELY to install new lanterns on the railings at the front entrance of the building, and security cameras at ground and lower ground floor level.
